nodes.text: The Rift Alliance Coalition Forces was the combined military forces of the planet members of the Rift Alliance during the Cold War. They answered first to the Rift Alliance's leaders and performed many missions for them. One unit was a contingent based on Hoth commanded by Felix Iresso. When the Rift Alliance rejoined the Republic, the Coalition Forces were reabsorbed into the Republic Army but were still unofficially under the command of the Barsen'thor.
